sys_ui_macro.description: Populate the categories in the MA incident "category" field
sys_ui_macro.name: PopulateCategories
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_categories" object="true"> var categories = new GlideRecord('x_123998_marketing_marketevent_categories'); //location.addQuery('country','USA'); //Give the query filter condition if any as per your requirement categories.query(); categories; </g:evaluate>
<select id="categories_level"> <option value="">-- None --</option> <j:while test="${jvar_categories.next()}"> <option value="${jvar_categories.getValue('name')}">${jvar_categories.getValue('name')}</option> </j:while> </select>
</j:jelly>
